Home.title: Rewards Holiday
Home.Iwouldtakefully: I would take fully responsibility for airline penalty if I provide passenger name, gender, date of birth in errors or mistake. If I am going to change my passport currently, I confirm that I will update my passport information 6 months ahead of departure to Rewards Holiday.
